body:
Comment 5: 
Lots of people can have lots of different opinions on the meaning of "achieving
polymorphism". Interfaces do provide a dynamic dispatch mechanism that can be used in
various idioms. Whether that would satisfy the original issue creator is an open
question. In general this kind of discussion really does work better on the mailing list
or on StackOverflow than it does on the isssue tracker.
_Labels changed: added **restrict-addissuecomment-commit**._
